ARABIC: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنَّا نَبْغِ فَٱرْتَدَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَارِهِمَا قَصَصًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'That is the very thing that we were looking for!' So, following their footsteps, they retraced their route.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Moses said: "But that is exactly what we were seeking." So they retraced their steps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: "That is what we were looking for." So the two turned back, retracing their footsteps,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses said, "That is exactly what we are seeking. They followed their own foot prints back (to the rock)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Moosa, “This is exactly what we wanted”; so they came back retracing their steps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Musa] said: "That is what we have been seeking." So they went back retracing their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: This is what we sought for; so they returned retracing their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'This is what we were seeking!' And so they returned upon their tracks, retracing them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: This is that which we have been seeking. So they retraced their steps again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said, "That is just what we were looking for." So they went back the way they had come,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Musa said: that is that which we have been seeking. So they turned back upon their footsteps, retracing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘That is what we were after!’ So they returned, retracing their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Moses said: "That was what we were seeking after:" So they went back on their footsteps, following (the path they had come).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Musa (Moses)] said: "That is what we have been seeking." So they went back retracing their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is what we have been seeking' said he, and they retraced their footsteps
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “This is what we were seeking.” And so they turned back retracing their steps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Moses] said, "That is what we were seeking." So they returned, following their footprints.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:64] Said he, Moses, ‘That, namely, our losing the fish, is what we have been seeking!’, what we have been after, for it is a sign for us of the presence of the one whom we seek. So they turned back, retracing their footsteps, until they reached the rock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Moses said: (This is that which we have been seeking) as an indication from Allah to Khidr (they retraced their steps again) they went back, following their own footsteps.
